name: Einherjar
description: The Einherjar is a robust medium humanoid clad in chain mail and wielding a shield, with a presence that embodies chaotic neutrality, drawing upon celestial powers. They are powerful melee and ranged combatants with a piercing gaze.
memorable: The Einherjar's ability to enter a battle frenzy when near defeat makes it terrifying and unpredictable.
goals: To engage in combat, showcasing prowess and intimidating foes, while drawing on celestial powers to aid in battle.
relations: Often found alongside other celestial beings or in conflicts where they can assert their chaotic nature.
environment: Typically encountered in areas of conflict or celestial influence, often amidst battlefields or enchanted locations.
strengths: Resistance to piercing damage from nonmagical sources and access to powerful celestial abilities enhance its combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Relative averageness in intelligence and charisma may limit its manipulative abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack strategy, incorporating melee Battleaxe strikes and ranged Celestial Bolts, with added radiant damage on hits.
most_powerful_ability: The Battle Frenzy ability grants it advantage on attack rolls under 30 hit points, making it especially deadly when wounded.
equipment: Wields a Battleaxe and has chain mail armor, offering both melee strength and protection.
senses: Possesses truesight of 60 feet, enabling it to see through illusions and darkness.
skills: Excels in Intimidation and has notable bonuses in Animal Handling and Perception.
additional_information: Gains advantage on Intimidation checks against Humanoids with its Fearsome Gaze.
Weapon attacks deal extra 3d8 radiant damage due to its Runic Weapons ability.
Can invoke Celestial Blessing for various supernatural aids in combat.
Durable combatant with high hit points and strong constitution.
Designed for both melee and ranged combat effectively.
spellcasting: Has access to celestial abilities, granting blessings and enhanced damage during combat.
test_queries: warrior capable of seeing through illusions
humanoid with celestial powers and high durability
intimidating creature with radiant weapon attacks
creature that grows stronger when wounded
